title: YOUNG WARRIOR: JUNAID CHAFEKER
author: MJ. LI
introduction: The world makes way for those who know where they are going â€“ this is the message that greets visitors when the enter the home of Muhammed Junaid Chafeker, in Goodwood, Cape Town. It does not take long for one to realise that this Capetonian knows exactly where he is going.  Chafeker is a master of Chinese martial art of Kung Fu, and the confidence and ease with which he speaks about his sport, shows that this is a man who knows the intricacies of the discipline.
